message: Let's be fair and start with 60-40
My turn.  How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a better deal than you'll get if we wait any longer.
Still willing to compromise, but I won't go below 58-42
Okay, Alice, let's be reasonable. 52/48 - I'm meeting you closer to the middle.
Not budging much, 57-43 is my new middle ground
Alice, inflation is eating our money!  This is my final offer - 51/49.  Take it or leave it, but we're both losing if we wait any longer.
